title: Alert Terms And Conditions - Sam's Club
text:
Mobile Terms of Use – Alerts
Urgent Alerts
Sam's Club may contact you at any time regarding urgent health and safety matters or for emergency purposes, including by auto-dialed text or prerecorded message, regardless of whether you have opted-out of being contacted. Examples may include recalls, product warnings, and other messages that impact health and safety (including family and pets).
Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger Text Message Terms & Conditions
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. ("Sam's Club") Health & Wellness Messenger program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger alerts are a subscription service. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. The texts will be sent via automated technology. Participation in the Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger alerts program is not required for purchase. You may receive multiple, recurring messages related to the status of your prescription. These messages may include notifications when your prescription is ready to pick up, when your prescription has been received at the pharmacy from your doctor, when a delay occurs in filling your prescription or a reminder when a refill is due for your current prescription. You agree that these messages may include limited personal information about your prescriptions, and whoever has access to the mobile phone or carrier account will also be able to see this information. You acknowledge and understand that messages are sent without encryption, which presents some security risk. You may opt out at any time by texting STOP to 85874, calling 1-800-201-0595, contacting your Sam's Club Pharmacy, or contacting us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. For help, text HELP to 85874 or call your Sam's Club Pharmacy to adjust your preferences. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking the "Privacy Policy" link at the bottom of the page.
Términos y Condiciones de Mensajes de Texto de Salud y Bienestar de Sam's Club
Al proporcionar su número de teléfono, se inscribe en el Programa de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam's West, Inc. ("Sam's Club") y acuerda los siguientes Términos y Condiciones: Al inscribirse, usted certifica que A) es el titular de la cuenta y acuerda inscribirse o tiene el consentimiento del titular de la cuenta para inscribirse y B) es mayor de 18 años. Las Alertas de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam's Club son un servicio de suscripción. El servicio de Sam's Club no tiene costo, pero PUEDEN APLICARSE TARIFAS POR MENSAJES Y DATOS DE SU PROVEEDOR DE SERVICIO. Los mensajes de texto se enviarán mediante tecnología automatizada. La participación en el Programa de Alertas de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam's Club no es requerida para la compra. Puede que reciba muchos mensajes recurrentes relacionados con el estado de su receta. Estos mensajes pueden incluir notificaciones sobre cuándo está lista su receta para ser retirada, cuándo su médico le ha enviado su receta a la farmacia, cuándo hay una demora en el surtido de su receta o puede ser un recordatorio del vencimiento de la reposición de su receta actual. Acuerda que estos mensajes pueden incluir información personal limitada sobre sus recetas y quien tenga acceso al teléfono celular o a la cuenta de la empresa de telefonía también podrá ver esta información. Reconoce y comprende que los mensajes se le envían sin cifrado, lo que representa algo de riesgo de seguridad. Puede salir en cualquier momento enviando ALTO por mensaje de texto al 85874, llamando al 1-800-201-0595, comunicándose con su farmacia de Sam's Club, o llamándonos a Walmart Corporate, Oficina Privada, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. Para recibir ayuda, envíe HELP por mensaje de texto al 85874 o llame a su farmacia Sam's Club para configurar sus preferencias. Las empresas de telefonía participantes incluyen todas las empresas de telefonía móvil de EE. UU. Sam's Club y T-Mobile® no son responsables por los mensajes retrasados o no entregados. El producto no es compatible con todos los modelos de teléfono celular. Puede acceder a nuestra Política de Privacidad haciendo clic en el enlace “Política de Privacidad” en la parte inferior de la página.
Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger Voice Message Terms & Conditions
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam’s West, Inc. ("Sam's Club") Health & Wellness Messenger program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger alerts are a subscription service, which may include pre-recorded and auto-dialed calls. Participation in the Sam's Club Health & Wellness Messenger alerts program is not required for purchase. With your subscription, you may receive multiple, recurring messages relating to the status of your prescriptions. These messages may include notifications when your prescription is ready to pick up, when your prescription has been received at the pharmacy from your doctor, when a delay occurs in filling your prescription or a reminder when a refill is due for your current prescription. You agree that these messages may include limited personal information about your prescriptions, and whoever has access to the phone or voicemail will also be able to hear this information. You acknowledge and understand that messages are sent without encryption, which presents some security risk. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S AIRTIME, MSG, AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. These calls will come from your local pharmacy's phone number. When you opt in to this service, you may receive a confirmation telephone call. During this call, you will need to follow the prompts to confirm your opt in or opt-out. You may opt out at any time by calling 1-800-201-0595, contacting your Sam's Club Pharmacy, or contacting us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. For help call your Sam's Club Pharmacy. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking the "Privacy Policy" link at the bottom of the page.
Términos y Condiciones de Mensajes de Voz de Salud y Bienestar de Sam's Club
Al proporcionar su número de teléfono, se inscribe en el Programa de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam’s West, Inc. (“Walmart” o “Sam’s Club”) y acuerda los siguientes Términos y Condiciones: Al inscribirse, usted certifica que A) es el titular de la cuenta y acuerda inscribirse o tiene el consentimiento del titular de la cuenta para inscribirse y B) es mayor de 18 años. Las Alertas de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam’s Club son un servicio de suscripción, lo que puede incluir llamadas automáticas o pregrabadas. La participación en el Programa de Alertas de Mensajes de Salud y Bienestar de Sam’s Club no es requerida para la compra. Con su suscripción, puede que reciba muchos mensajes recurrentes relacionados con el estado de sus recetas. Estos mensajes pueden incluir notificaciones sobre cuándo está lista su receta para ser retirada, cuándo su médico le ha enviado su receta a la farmacia, cuándo hay una demora en el surtido de su receta o puede ser un recordatorio del vencimiento de la reposición de su receta actual. Acuerda que estos mensajes pueden incluir información personal limitada sobre sus recetas y quien tenga acceso al teléfono celular o a la cuenta del transportista también podrá oír esta información. Reconoce y comprende que los mensajes se le envían sin cifrado, lo que representa algo de riesgo de seguridad. El servicio de Sam’s Club no tiene costo, pero PUEDEN APLICARSE TARIFAS POR TIEMPO DE LLAMADAS, MENSAJES Y DATOS DE SU PROVEEDOR DE SERVICIO. Estas llamadas provendrán del número de teléfono de su farmacia local. Al salir de este servicio, puede que reciba una llamada telefónica de confirmación. Durante esta llamada, deberá seguir las indicaciones para confirmar su adhesión o salida. Puede salir en cualquier momento llamando al 1-800-201-0595, comunicándose con su farmacia de Sam’s Club, o llamándonos a Walmart Corporate, Oficina Privada, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. Para recibir ayuda llame a su farmacia de Sam's Club. Puede acceder a nuestra Política de Privacidad haciendo clic en el enlace “Política de Privacidad” en la parte inferior de la página.
Health & Wellness Clinical Services Alerts – Text Message and Voice Calls
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. ("Sam's Club") Clinical Services Messaging program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Sam's Club Clinical Services Messaging program is a subscription service which may include automated text messages and/or automated, prerecorded calls. Messages may be delivered from the Sam's Club Pharmacy (including Walmart Specialty Pharmacy and Home Delivery Pharmacy) or Optical Center, as appropriate. Participation in the Sam's Club Clinical Services Messaging program is not required for purchase. With your subscription, you may receive multiple messages relating to clinical services we offer. These messages may include information about immunizations or clinical services, follow-up related to services you have received, information to help you manage your health or disease state, information related to the cost or payment for services, or appointment reminders. You agree that these messages may include limited personal information about you, and whoever has access to the mobile phone or carrier account will also be able to see this information. You acknowledge and understand that messages are sent without encryption, which presents some security risk. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S AIRTIME, MSG, AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. You may opt out at any time by texting STOP to 40628 or 64584 or contacting Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. For help, text HELP to 40628 or 64584 or contact your Sam's Club facility to adjust your preferences. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. Sam's Club and carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking the "Privacy Policy" link at the bottom of the page.
Términos de los mensajes de texto automáticos y de las llamadas automáticas y pregrabadas de los Servicios Clínicos de Sam's Club
Al proporcionar su número de teléfono, se inscribe en el Programa de Mensajes de Servicios Clínicos de Sam's West, Inc. (“Sam's Club”) y acuerda los siguientes Términos y Condiciones: Al inscribirse, usted certifica que A) es el titular de la cuenta y acuerda inscribirse o tiene el consentimiento del titular de la cuenta para inscribirse y B) es mayor de 18 años. El Programa de Servicios Clínicos de Sam's Club es un servicio de suscripción que puede incluir mensajes de texto automáticos o llamadas automáticas y pregrabadas. Los mensajes pueden provenir de la farmacia de Sam's Club (incluida la farmacia especializada y la farmacia de entrega a domicilio de Walmart) o el centro óptico, según corresponda. La participación en el Programa de Servicios Clínicos de Sam's Club no es requerida para la compra. Con su suscripción, puede recibir varios mensajes relacionados con los servicios clínicos que ofrecemos. Estos mensajes pueden incluir información sobre vacunas o servicios clínicos, seguimiento relacionado con los servicios que ha recibido, información para ayudarle a gestionar su salud o el estado de su enfermedad, información relacionada con el costo o el pago de los servicios, o recordatorios de citas. Acuerda que estos mensajes pueden incluir información personal limitada sobre usted y quien tenga acceso al teléfono celular o a la cuenta de la empresa de telefonía también podrá ver esta información. Reconoce y comprende que los mensajes se le envían sin cifrado, lo que representa cierto riesgo de seguridad. El servicio de Sam's Club no tiene costo, pero PUEDEN APLICARSE TARIFAS POR TIEMPO DE LLAMADAS, MENSAJES Y DATOS DE SU PROVEEDOR DE SERVICIO. Puede salir en cualquier momento enviando la palabra ALTO (STOP) por mensaje de texto al 40628 o 64584 o mediante correo postal a Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. Para recibir ayuda, envíe la palabra AYUDA (HELP) por mensaje de texto al 40628 o 64584 o comuníquese con su tienda de Sam's Club para configurar sus preferencias. Las empresas de telefonía participantes incluyen a todas las empresas de telefonía de los EE. UU. Sam's Club y las empresas de telefonía no son responsables por los mensajes retrasados o no entregados. El producto no es compatible con todos los modelos de teléfono celular. Puede acceder a nuestra Política de Privacidad haciendo clic en el enlace “Política de Privacidad” en la parte inferior de la página.
Club Pickup® Order Ready Alerts
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Walmart Inc. ("Walmart" or "Sam's Club") Club Pickup® Order Ready Alerts program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: By entering your phone number, you certify that A) you are the account holder or B) have account holder's permission to do so. Participation in this program is not required as part of your purchase. Club Pickup® Order Ready Alerts are a subscription service sent via automated technology. You will receive a text message to confirm your subscription to Sam's Club mobile alerts. If you do not wish to subscribe, do not respond to this confirmation text message or reply STOP. You may receive multiple messages related to the status of your Club Pickup or Special Order items. There is no charge for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. For help, reply HELP to 73350 or 78412 for help or call 1-888-746-7726. To opt-out text STOP to 73350 or 78412, call 888-746-7726, or contact us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. T-Mobile® and Sam's Club are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking on the "Privacy policy" link at the bottom of the page.
Sam's Club Mobile Phone Verification
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. (Sam's Club) Mobile Phone Verification text message program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. The Sam's Club Mobile Phone Verification text message is an on-demand, single message text program. When you provide your phone number you will receive a single text message with a verification code. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. The texts will be sent via automated technology. For help, text HELP to 90624 or 43303, call 888-746-7726 or contacting us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. To opt-out, text STOP to 90624 or 43303. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. T-Mobile® and Sam's Club are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking on the “Privacy policy” link at the bottom of the page.
Sam's Club One-Time Text Message
By providing your phone number or texting a designated keyword to the program short code, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. (Sam's Club) one-time text message program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. The Sam's Club one-time text message is an on-demand text program in which you will receive one message. Review program material for details about the message you are agreeing to receive. This message may contain promotional or marketing information. Participation is not required for purchase. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. The texts will be sent via automated technology. For help, text HELP to 70175 or 43303 or contact us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. To opt-out, text STOP to 70175 or 43303. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. T-Mobile® and Sam's Club are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking on the “Privacy Policy” link at the bottom of the page.
Sam's Club Account Security Alerts Terms & Conditions
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. (Sam's Club) Account Security messaging program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have the account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Account Security alerts are an automated text message service that provides you multiple messages regarding the security of your account, including messages that contain a verification code or other alerts regarding your account. Texts will be sent via automated technology. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. Sam's Club and T-Mobile® are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. Participation in the Account Security messaging program is not required for purchase. You may opt out by texting STOP to 91935, 73105 or 39624. For help, text HELP to 91935, 73105 or 39624 or call 1-888-746-7726. You may also contact us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160 regarding this program.
Sam's Club Promotional Text Message Program
By providing your phone number or texting a designated keyword to the program short code, you are enrolling in the Sam's West, Inc. (Sam's Club) promotional text message program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll, and B) you are age 18 or older. Review program material for details about the messages you are agreeing to receive. These messages may contain promotional or marketing information. Participation is not required for purchase. There is no charge from Sam's Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. The texts will be sent via automated technology. For help, text HELP to 83645 or contact us at Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. To opt-out, text STOP to 83645. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. T-Mobile® and Sam's Club are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking on the “Privacy Policy” link at the bottom of the page.
Sam’s Club Marketing Text Messages Terms and Conditions
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam’s West, Inc. (“Sam’s Club”) Marketing Messaging program and are agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Sam’s Club Marketing Messaging program is an automated text messaging service that provides multiple messages based on your shopping activity. These messages may include promotional and marketing text messages. Message frequency may vary. Message & data rates may apply. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. Sam’s Club and carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. Participation in in SMS updates is not required for purchase. The phone number from which you receive messages may vary by message. You may opt out by texting STOP to the phone number from which you received messages which will opt you out of all future SMS communications via this program. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking on the “Privacy Policy” link at the bottom of the page.
Sam’s Club Vision Alerts
By providing your phone number, you are enrolling in the Sam’s West Inc. ("Sam’s Club") Vision messaging program and agreeing to the following Terms and Conditions: When you enroll, you certify that A) you are the account holder and consent to enroll or have account holder's consent to enroll and B) you are age 18 or older. Sam’s Club Vision Messaging program is a subscription service which may include automated text messages and/or automated, prerecorded calls. Participation in the Sam’s Club Vision Messaging program is not required for purchase. With your subscription, you may receive multiple messages relating to services we offer. These messages may include information about appointment reminders, follow-up related to services you have received or orders you have placed, and marketing information about products and services that may interest you. You agree that these messages may include limited personal information about you, and whoever has access to the mobile phone or carrier account will also be able to see this information. You acknowledge and understand that messages are sent without encryption, which presents some security risk. There is no charge from Sam’s Club for this service, but YOUR SERVICE PROVIDER'S AIRTIME, MSG, AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY. You may opt out at any time by texting STOP to 54400 or contacting Walmart Corporate, Privacy Office, MS #0160 702 SW 8th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0160. For help, text HELP to 54400 or contact your Sam’s Club facility to adjust your preferences. Participating carriers include all US-based mobile carriers. Sam’s Club and carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. Product is not compatible with all cell phone models. You can access our Privacy Policy by clicking the “Privacy Policy” link at the bottom of the page.
